text: Zig Zag is a 2002 American drama movie directed by first time director David S. Goyer and was based on the 1999 novel of the same name by Landon J. Napoleon. It stars Wesley Snipes, John Leguizamo, Oliver Platt, Luke Goss and Natasha Lyonne. ==Other websites== * Category:2002 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by David S. Goyer Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about autism
title: Zig Zag (2002 movie)
